description: Much like costume morph suits have a fan to not only fill the suit up with air but to also keep the person wearing the suit from getting hot
summary: One of the main issues with the safety of the Ebola suits is the fact that the workers are getting so hot that they are having to put on and take off the suit every 40 minutes or so. To help decrease this happening, there should be some sort of fan installed in the suit to help circulate air to make it less hot for the workers.
title: Prevent Constant Removal of Ebola Suites
